channel.title: Daily Tech News Show
channel.itunes:author: Tom Merritt
channel.itunes:summary: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.
channel.description: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.

item.title: DTNS 2146 – Curved is better than flat
item.itunes:summary: Tom chats with Nicole Lee from Engadget about the Best of CES and the new Google + email ‘feature.’ Plus Len Peralta joins to draw the stories! MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks […]

item.title: DTNS 2145 – Watch this!
item.itunes:summary: Myke Hurley from 5 by 5 joins us to review some of the cooler items from off the beaten path at CES. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa A. from thepolarcat.com for […]

item.title: DTNS 2144 – Putting the smart in TV
item.itunes:summary: Tom reviews some more announcements from CES, especially Sony’s Internet TV service, with Justin Robert Young. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa A. from thepolarcat.com for the logo! Today’s album art courtesy […]

item.title: DTNS 2143 – AT&T Slow Cooks Neutrality
item.itunes:summary: Tom chats with Jon Brodkin from Ars Technica. They’ll talk a little about CES and a lot about whether AT&T’s new ‘subsidized data’ plans break net neutrality. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to […]

item.title: DTNS 2142 – The fungi at CES 2014
item.itunes:summary: Tom chats with Lamarr Wilson about what’s happening at CES 2014 in las vegas. Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. MP3 Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the new opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa A. from thepolarcat.com for the logo! Kylde has joined TomGehrke and […]

item.title: DTNS 2141: Quanto smash!
item.itunes:summary: Darren Kitchen of Hak5 joins me to talk about Quantum Computers and free Harvard coding classes, while Len Peralta illustrates the show and introduces us to Quanto! Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. MP3 Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music! Big thanks to Sam Smith for the logo! Show Notes […]

item.title: DTNS 2140: My car has lasers
item.itunes:summary: Tim Stevens joins me to talk about the tech news of the day, Ford’s solar car, and auto expectations at CES. Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org.
